scripts.build-release: scripts\build-js-release.bat & npm run build-js-css & npm run build-css
scripts.build-debug: scripts\build-js-debug.bat & npm run build-js-css & npm run build-css
scripts.build-release-win: start /min cmd /c scripts\build-js-release.bat && start /min cmd /c npm run build-js-css && start /min cmd /c npm run build-css
scripts.build-release-linux: npm run build-js-release & npm run build-js-css & npm run build-css & npm run set-php-build-consts
scripts.build-debug-linux: npm run build-js-debug & npm run build-js-css & npm run build-css & npm run set-php-build-consts
